Despite being among the weakest linnorms, the crag linnorm is a devastating predator, capable of quickly cooking their foes with their magma breath. **[Recall Knowledge - Dragon](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=35)): DC 34 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 32 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 29 [Crag Linnorm](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3083) **Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 220 1.1 **Perception** +26; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=74) ([imprecise](/Rules.aspx?ID=412)) 60 feet, [_truesight_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Fey](/Languages.aspx?ID=119) **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +22, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +28 **Str** +8 **Dex** +4 **Con** +6 **Int** -3 **Wis** +4 **Cha** +5 --- **AC** 37 **Fort** +28 **Ref** +24 **Will** +22 +1 status to all saves vs. [magic](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) **HP** 270 , regeneration 10 (deactivated by [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916)) **Immunities** [curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=696) **Weaknesses** cold iron 10 **Curse of Fire** ([curse](/Traits.aspx?ID=566), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=604), [primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=676)) When a creature slays the crag linnorm, it must succeed at a DC 35 Will save or gain weakness to fire 15 with an unlimited duration.
**[Reactive Strike](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=48)** Tail only. --- **Speed** 35 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 60 feet; [_unfettered movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) **Melee** jaws +30 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d12+14 piercing plus crag linnorm venom **Melee** claw +30 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d8+14 slashing **Melee** tail +30 ([reach 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192), [Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)), **Damage** 3d6+14 bludgeoning plus [Improved Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=666) **Primal Innate Spells** DC 33 - **6th** [Truesight](/Spells.aspx?ID=1727) - **Constant (6th)** [Unfettered Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=1732) **[Constrict](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=57)** 2d6+14 bludgeoning, DC 34 **Crag Linnorm Venom** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** DC 34 Fortitude; **Maximum Duration** 10 rounds; **Stage 1** 4d6 fire damage and [drained 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) (1 round); **Stage 2** 6d6 fire damage and drained 2 (1 round) **Magma Breath** ([Fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72), [Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134)) The crag linnorm breathes out a stream of magma in a 120-foot line that deals 12d6 fire damage to creatures within the area (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). Any creature that fails its save also takes 4d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29). The linnorm can't use Magma Breath again for 1d4 rounds. The magma remains until the start of the linnorm's next turn. If the linnorm was on the ground, the magma remains as a burning line on the ground directly under the line of the Magma Breath; if the linnorm was airborne, the magma rains down in a sheet 60 feet high. Any creature that moves across or through the magma takes 6d6 fire damage (DC 34 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save). At the start of the linnorm's next turn, the magma cools to a thin layer of brittle stone, or the magma rain finishes falling and turns to harmless pebbles. The cooled magma quickly degrades to powder and sand over the course of several hours.
name: Crag Linnorm
